zMeetup.tiêuĐề: Make friends & BlaBla Language Exchange Saigon
zMeetup.môTả:
**⚠️⚠️⚠️ 🍹/🍔 You are asked to order a drink or something to eat BEFORE joining the group (MANDATORY) ⚠️⚠️⚠️**

Meet new people - Make international and local friends - Speak languages (mingle) - Have fun ;)
**👉 Any question or request?** **[Reach out to us on Instagram](www.instagram.com/blablalanguage) !**

**👉 Some guidelines for a delightful experience:**
\- 🍺🥤 You are asked to order a drink directly upon arrival to participate \(Mandatory\)\.
\- 🚫 Outside food and drinks are not allowed\.
\- 🧹 Please respect the venues staff and make sure to leave the place clean and tidy before you leave\.
\- 🤝 Be polite and respectful\.
Please kindly note that venue staff or our organizers will ban you from our events and community without any warning if you don't respect it. We offer you opportunities to make friends and improve your language skills for free, be nice enough to make things easy for us.

**👉 How it's working:**
We are working with a mingle setup and we usually don't have designated language tables or areas.
English and the local language are typically spoken.
If you would like to speak other languages, please ask the organizers or seek for participants who meet your language expectations.
📲 **[Stay updated via our Telegram channel](https://t.me/+hMPnr0fIOfhjYzU8)**

👉 **Join Our BlaBla Whatsapp Group in Your City**
Simply **[subscribe here](https://www.blablalanguageexchange.com/events/blabla-and-make-friends-saigon)** to be part of our BlaBla community online and stay connected!

**👉 Things to keep in mind before joining:**
\- 📷 By attending our events\, you consent to being photographed or filmed\. Photos and videos taken during the events will be shared on our social media\. If you do not wish to appear in the photos\, please send us a private message as soon as possible on Instagram \(@blablalanguage\)\.
\- 🦹‍♂️ Remember to keep an eye on your belongings and prioritize your own well\-being\. We are not responsible for any lost items or personal issues\.

**👉🦸🏻‍♀️/🦸🏻 Make a Difference with BlaBla: Volunteer as an Event Organizer (volunteering)!**
These gatherings are brought to you by BlaBla Language Exchange, spanning over 150 cities across 5 continents. We are always looking for new organizers. **[More information and application here !](https://www.blablalanguageexchange.com/event-organizers)**

**👉🦸🏻‍♀️/🦸🏻 Share your photography / video skills: Volunteer as photographer (volunteering)!**
Are you a photo virtuoso or a video wizard? 📷🎥 Whether you're a pro or a passionate newbie, we want YOU!
No cash, but lots of laughs and fame (well, sort of). We'll even give you a virtual high-five! 🌐🙌
**[More information and application here !](https://www.blablalanguageexchange.com/photographer)**
zMeetup.địaĐiểm: 385 D1-D2, Đ. Nguyễn Trãi, Quận 1, 71014, Vietnam

zMeetup.tiêuĐề: Mundo Lingo Saigon - Thao Dien D. 2
zMeetup.môTả:
100s of people from around the 🌎 meet weekly to socialise, have a drink, and meet foreign/local people of all ages. It's chilled, fun and free.

🟢 The Flags
Place flags on your chest from top to bottom according to fluency. We offer flags from 200+ places.

🟢 Stand to mingle, sit to dwindle!

🗣 Talk about anything you like. You don't have to be an advanced speaker - it's open to everyone!

🛎 Reception 8 - 9pm
Not obligatory, but arrive at this time if you’re new or want those drinks specials.

Connect with us 👉 [linktr.ee/mundolingo](https://linktr.ee/mundolingo)

It's games night, and that means it's time to find the final solution, to destroying your opponents. Be it Secret Hitler, or the Dwellings of Eldervale, it's always the same, crush the souls of your foes, or at least their meeples.

We have Power Grid, Betrayal at House on the Hill, Stockpile, Machi Koro, and the ever great, Splendor. The price of all this, have a drink. :)
zMeetup.địaĐiểm: 258 Đ. Nơ Trang Long, Phường 12, Bình Thạnh

zMeetup.môTả:
Join us for a data meetup in HCMC on Saturday, 14 December.

At Volume 17 of our get-together, we’ll be talking about the AI.

**AI AGENTIC WORKFLOWS: CORE ELEMENTS & POTENTIAL**
Speakers: Duong My Quan (prompt engineer) and To Vu Tuan Hung (data architect), Datum Consulting

AI agents are autonomous pieces of software that collaborate, plan, and execute tasks on your behalf. They act independently and make decisions within a framework you design to achieve a specific outcome.

Leveraging AI agents is like having a team of virtual helpers that understand the job, communicate with each other, and carry out tasks for you efficiently.

An AI agentic workflow sets out the parameters and processes for how your AI agents operate. It includes the guidelines and tools that define how these agents work to achieve the specific goals you have set.

Join us for a presentation by prompt engineer Duong My Quan and data architect To Vu Tuan Hung from Datum Consulting. Quan and Hung are going to look into the core elements of AI agentic workflows and the potential they have for practitioners and modern organisations.

**WHEN & WHERE**
Saturday, 14 December
09:30–12.30 ICT

📍 Infinite Lambda’s HCMC office
6th floor, ABTEL TOWER, 36 Phan Dang Luu Street
Ward 6, Binh Thanh District
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

🔥 This event is perfect for you if you want to:

* Learn about AI agents and agentic workflows;
* Tap into expert insights from real-world project experience;
* Meet the community and build valuable connections;
* Explore opportunities in data and AI.

We are all here to learn, so don’t hesitate to join us, even if you have little or no previous experience.

zMeetup.tiêuĐề: CTE Dist 3: Meet up with the locals
zMeetup.môTả:
A perfect group for socializing and growing your network in Saigon.

At Coffee Talk English, we also host: Board Games nights and DnD nights which are great to meet people and have some fun!

Coffee Talk English 611/4C Điện Biên Phủ, Ward 1, District 3, HCMC.

Hãy tham gia cùng Coffee Talk English, để:

* Có cơ hội thực hành tiếng Anh trực tiếp với người bản ngữ, chứ không phải học qua sách vở
* Được tìm hiểu thêm về văn hóa của các nước trên thế giới
* Được chia sẻ với các bạn tây về văn hóa và con người Việt mình nhé
* Được chơi board games với các bạn tây nữa nha!!! Tiếng Anh đời thường 100% đấy các bạn (tụi mình chỉ luật chơi cho các bạn mới nhé)
* Và còn được kết bạn với các bạn tây nữa cơ

Hãy mau đến tham gia cùng chúng tớ tại Coffee Talk English 611/4C Điện Biên Phủ, Ward 1, District 3, HCMC nha!

https://www.facebook.com/coffeetalkenglish.hcmc

zMeetup.môTả:
It's boardgames night, and that means it's time to find the final solution, to destroying your opponents. Be it Secret Hitler, or Small World, it's always the same, crush the souls of your foes, or at least their meeples.

We play Splendor, Avalon, Betrayal at House on the Hill, King of Tokyo, Machi Koro, and the ever great, Secret Hitler. The price of all this, have a drink. :)

@Community living room, Ground floor, Thu Thiem Sky Apartment
Contact Huong for more details or directions: 983512487
Email: lopthiensahaja@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SahajaVietnam/
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sahaja Yoga is a unique and natural way to attain Self - Realization which leads to inner enlightenment. Through that inner enlightenment we become our own masters and start to master all kinds of things around us as well. Please take time to learn this technique and grow in reality.

These classes are meant to come together and meditate and learn little by little, so please plan to join them every week for continuous growth. Sahaja Yoga is always free.

Meeting Plan :

Introduction to Sahaja Yoga

Experience of being in Meditation and Learning to Meditate.

How to meditate at home.
--------------------------------------------------------------

Sahaja Yoga is always free

zMeetup.môTả:
**Food for Thought Videos and Questions**

Watch curated YouTube videos on the topic at:

[https://www.buddytree.org/topic/The-Holiday-Season](https://www.buddytree.org/topic/The-Holiday-Season)

–––––––

Meaningful Discussions events take place in **11 countries** and this will be our 26th event in Ho Chi Minh City! :)

Please be sure to **ARRIVE ON TIME** since everyone will be divided up to tables of 6 people at the start time.

This event will provide the opportunity for a thoughtful, respectful and engaging discussion with Food For Thought videos, discussion facilitators at each table and discussion questions provided. So if you're looking for **open-minded, friendly and intelligent people** then you've come to the right place!

**PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING DETAILS:**

1. All members are asked to watch at least one of the **Food For Thought Videos** prior to arrival in the interest of stimulating your own thoughts and opinions on this subject.
2. Don't be afraid to **sign up** first to this event since I will cancel the event if less than 5 people sign up. If the event is full then please add yourself to the waiting list for the event.
3. Please remember to **arrive on time.**

–––––––

For more information or to attend events online please visit:
[https://www.buddytree.org](https://www.buddytree.org/)

zMeetup.tiêuĐề: Ho Chi Minh City ServiceNow Developer Meetup Q4 2024 - Christmas Special 🎄
zMeetup.môTả:
🎄 **Ho Chi Minh City ServiceNow Developer Meetup Q4 2024 - Christmas Special** 🎄
Join us for a special holiday edition of the Ho Chi Minh ServiceNow Developer Meetup!! Celebrate the season with fellow ServiceNow developers in a joyful atmosphere filled with Christmas cheer, networking opportunities, and festive fun.

🗓 **Date**: Thursday, December 19, 2024
🕕 **Time**: 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM
📍 **Location**: CODE LEAP Office, Level 17, 101 Nguyen Cuu Van Street, Ward 17, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

**🎉** Event Highlights:

* **6:00 PM**: Welcome and check-in with Christmas tree, holiday music, and festive attire
* **6:30 PM**: Opening remarks & meetup introduction
* **6:45 PM:** Sharing sessions by Cuong Phan - Let's talk about Now Assist in Xanadu
* **7:15 PM:** Sharing sessions by Nghi Nguyen - Insight of a Greenfield Project
* **7:45 PM:** Networking & Christmas dinner, indulging in delicious food and drinks while making new connections.
* **8:30 PM:** Games & prizes, participating in fun holiday games for a chance to win exciting prizes.
* **8:45 PM**: Closing remarks and announcements for future events
* **9:00 PM**: Event concludes

**🎟️ FREE ENTRANCE!**
**Space is limited, so be sure to secure your spot!** This in-person happy hour is the perfect way to celebrate the holidays and meet more ServiceNow developers in the Ho Chi Minh area. Food and drinks will be provided, and no laptops are required this time—just your festive spirit!
Get your Christmas swags on and come join us for a night of fun, laughter, and holiday cheer! 🎅🎄
zMeetup.địaĐiểm: 101 Nguyen Cuu Van Street, Ward 17, Binh Thanh District

zMeetup.tiêuĐề: Living in the Present: A Psychological Approach
zMeetup.môTả:
***MAKE NOTE OF THE NEW LOCATION!:*** Thao Dien Eco Wellness Club (2nd Floor): 8C Đ. Số 12, Thảo Điền, TP Thu Duc, Hồ Chí Minh 713388

**Larger series:** Join us for an insightful events delving into the fascinating world of psychology and its applications to everyday life. Whether you are curious about cognitive processes, behavior patterns, or the complexities of the human mind, this event is designed to provide a deeper understanding of how psychology can be used to enhance various aspects of our lives.

**Topic for this meeting:** As the great Vietnamese Zen teacher Thich Nhat Hanh has said, “You have an appointment with life, an appointment that is in the here and now.” The profoundity of such words cannot be overstated. However, no matter how many times we hear it, our mind seems to draw us into endless labrynth of distractions from this life-saving and life-affirming fact. For, where else could happiness be found if not in the here and now? Where else will life ever be? In this meeting we explore this question and see how psychology can help illuminate and support our aspirations to keep this appointment.

**Agenda for meeting:** We will explore the topic first with a brief talk by clinical psychologist, psychotherapist, & founder of the Center for Wisdom Psychology. As part of the talk he will outline some practical tools that people can use to cultivate greater self-knowledge in their lives. Then, we will get a chance to apply what we learned in fun, structured exercises in smaller groups of 2 or 3. We will close with a larger discussion, and time for questions and comments.

**Who is it for:** This event is free and open to all interested in the topic. The event offers a unique opportunity to connect with like-minded individuals and gain valuable insights that can positively impact your personal growth and development. Whether you have a background in psychology or are simply interested in learning more about the subject, this event is sure to inspire and enlighten you.
zMeetup.địaĐiểm: 8C Đ. Số 12, Thảo Điền, TP Thu Duc, Hồ Chí Minh 713388
